definitions.definition: A vessel in which something is pounded , or an implement used in pounding.

main_definition: A vessel in which something is pounded , or an implement used in pounding.

definitions.definition: A gun capable of firing a specified weight of shot in pounds.
examples: The ship fired the twelve- pounder twice during the battle.

definitions.definition: Something that weighs a specified number of pounds .
Something or someone costing so many pounds sterling.
examples: The striker they bought from United was a million- pounder .

main_definition: ( in combination ) A gun capable of firing a specified weight of shot in pounds.
secondary_definitions: ( in combination ) Something that weighs a specified number of pounds .
( in combination ) Something or someone costing so many pounds sterling.
